text: Meet Willa Gray Akins! I can't believe our daughter is finally home?? Thank you to everyone who prayed every single day for this sweet girl pic. twitter. com / ykKFjI83wh — Thomas Rhett ( @ ThomasRhett ) May 12, 2017 She ’ s here! Thomas Rhett and his wife, Lauren, announced on social media on Friday, May 12, that they ’ ve welcomed a daughter named Willa Gray Akins home from Uganda. “ Meet Willa Gray Akins! I can ’ t believe our daughter is finally home??, ” the “ T - Shirt ” singer tweeted along with a family photo. “ Thank you to everyone who prayed every single day for this sweet girl. ” Thomas and Lauren
